SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.rim.device.api.browser.field
Interface RenderingConstants

public interface RenderingConstants

Defines a number of constant values used by the browser field API.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 4.0.0

Field Summary
static int DRM_FORWARD_LOCK
          Indication to the renderer that the content is protected by OMA DRM forward-lock.
static int EMBEDDED_CONTENT
          Hint for the renderer that the content is embedded.
static int NAVIGATION_MASK
          Mask to get navigation type.
static int NAVIGATION_TYPE_BACKWARD
          Backwards Navigation.
static int NAVIGATION_TYPE_FORWARD
          Forwards navigation.
static int NAVIGATION_TYPE_NO_CACHE
          No cache navigation.
static int NAVIGATION_TYPE_REFRESH
          Refresh navigation.
static int NAVIGATION_TYPE_REVALIDATE
          Revalidate navigation.
static int SHARED_MASK
          Bits 1 to 8, are propagated in requests, navigation type maybe reset; higher bits are reserved and only used by the field that it is being rendered.

SHARED_MASK

static final int SHARED_MASK
Bits 1 to 8, are propagated in requests, navigation type maybe reset; higher bits are reserved and only used by the field that it is being rendered.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 4.0.2

DRM_FORWARD_LOCK

static final int DRM_FORWARD_LOCK
Indication to the renderer that the content is protected by OMA DRM forward-lock. The renderer must not allow such content to be forwarded to another device.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 4.0.2
